game.title: The Lost Temple of Eldarath
game.objective: Retrieve the ancient artifact from the lost temple
game.description: A powerful artifact has been stolen from our kingdom, and we have reason to believe it is hidden in the long-abandoned temple of Eldarath. Retrieve the artifact and bring it back to us.
game.reward: 1000 gold coins and a magical amulet granting +2 intelligence

task.objective: Reach the entrance of the lost temple
task.description: The temple is said to be hidden deep within the nearby forest. Make your way through the treacherous terrain and find the entrance.
task.location: Eldarath Forest, 3 miles east of the kingdom

task.objective: Navigate the temple's traps and puzzles
task.description: The temple is said to be filled with deadly traps and complex puzzles. Use your wits and cunning to overcome these obstacles.
task.location: Inside the lost temple of Eldarath

task.objective: Retrieve the artifact from the treasure chamber
task.description: The artifact is said to be hidden in a treasure chamber deep within the temple. Fight off any guardians and retrieve the artifact.
task.location: Treasure Chamber, lost temple of Eldarath
